'''20w08a''' is the third [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.16]], released on February 19, 2020,<ref name="20w08a">{{snap|20w08a|February 19, 2020}}</ref> which fixes a major bug with [[villager]]s from [[20w07a]].
